The deyenge creature
[32] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
In Fletestrete at the sygne of ye sone by [Robert Copland? for] Wynkyn de Worde, [Enprynted at London : Anno d[omi]ni. M.CCCCC.xiiii. [1514]]
Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name conjectured by STC. Signatures: A-B⁶ C⁴. This state has Robert Copland's device on C4v. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
